title: My Services
description: I am a talented Robotics Engineer with a degree from WPI. I offer a wide range of technical and engineering services from robotics & automation, to programming & prototyping to WordPress & web development. All of my projects include 1:1 remote interaction & Project Management.

content.title: Robotics & Automation Engineering
content.description: I have professional experience in Automation, Manufacturing, and Production Operations. I can program Controls Systems including PLC's (Allen Bradley), troubleshoot Industrial Systems (Robots, Conveyors, Safety Systems, HMI's), and work with embedded microcontrollers (Arduino, NodeMCU, Raspberry Pi).

content.title: Custom Python & embedded C Programs
content.description: Need help with programming or debugging? Want to create a custom script? I have experience writing programs in Python and C (for microcontrollers). I can interface scripts with CSV's, Databases, and API's to reduce labor and provide real-time analysis.

content.title: WordPress Websites & eCommerce
content.description: Bring your ideas to life with a mobile-friendly, optimized WordPress website. I have full experience designing, building, and maintaining WordPress sites from scratch. This includes extensive knowledge with Domain/Hosting, SSL, WooCommerce, Payment Processing, Fulfillment, Metrics (Google Analytis / Facebook Pixels), and Portfolios/Landing Pages.
